meta.author: Subir Chowdhuri
meta.description: The Rosetta probe has beamed back one of the first true color images of the comet 67P

frontmatter.summary: The OSIRIS imaging system on board the Rosetta orbiter has beamed back one of the first 'true color' images of the comet 67P.
frontmatter.title: Rosetta Captures Comet 67P in True Color
